setDelay(int) - Method in class turtlefx.World
Set the amount of delay that is enforced between command execution so you can see them as they happen

Point the Turtle in a specific direction regardless of it current heading

Specify the color to be used when the Turtle fills in a color that it has draw

Set the name of this turtle

Change the color of the pen that the Turtle draws with

Change the thickness of the line that the Turtle draws

Set the minimum size for the world.

Make this turtle visible / invisible

Move the Turtle to a specific x-position
